subsection.name: Releases
subsection.p: All releases are available off the Sourceforge Downloads page. Release notes can be found here, Wayback Release Notes.

subsection.name: Continuous build
subsection.p: Here is a pointer to our continuous build box. The latest builds can be found under the 'Build Artifacts' link. Be aware that this distribution has been made from CVS HEAD and CVS HEAD builds are not guaranteed stable.
